CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

TI_TEXT.P: Servicios de transporte por la vía pública
Usługi w zakresie publicznego transportu drogowego

TITLE.P: Tender for the Supply of the Provision of Tendered Local Bus Services for 5.2018

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenders are being sought for a number of contracted local bus services within Angus. The tender will be divided into a number of lots. Operators may bid for as many of these routes as they wish.
Provision of late evening bus service on Mondays to Thursdays between Dundee and Ashludie Hospital.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of late afternoon bus service on Mondays to Fridays in Brechin.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

TITLE.P: A513 Monifieth Ashludie Hospital — Dundee (Sunday evenings)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of an evening bus service to operate Sundays only.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

TITLE.P: A523 Hillside — Montrose — Ferryden (Monday to Friday mornings)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of morning bus service on Mondays to Fridays between Hillside, Montrose and Ferryden.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Contract may be renewed on an annual basis for up to 2 further years.

TITLE.P: A524 Hillside — Montrose — Ferryden (Monday to Friday afternoons)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of a bus service on Mondays to Fridays afternoons between Hillside, Montrose and Ferryden.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Contract may be renewed on an annual basis for up to 2 further years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of a Monday to Saturday evening bus service within Arbroath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: This lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of a Monday to Saturday daytime bus service within Arbroath.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: This lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

TITLE.P: A546 Arbroath Town Services and Redford

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of a Monday to Saturday daytime bus service within Arbroath and between Arbroath, Redford and Guthrie.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: This lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of Sunday bus service between Liff, Fowlis and Dundee.
Operators should note that only one of contracts A516, A517, A518 OR A519 will be awarded.
A518 — Not service Piperdam or Dundee City Centre.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Lot may be extended on an annual basis for up to a further 2 years.

SUITABILITY.P: Part IV, A: Operators are required to have a PSV Operators Licence/Special Restricted Licence Number (PM Number) at the time of submitting their tender.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Must meet Angus Council's Insurance Requirements.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: It is a requirement that bidders hold or can commit to obtain prior to the commencement of any subsequently awarded contract the types of insurance detailed below:
— Employers Liability Insurance to the extent of at least GBP10m per claim and unlimited in total,
— Public Liability Insurance to the extent of at least GBP 5 000 000 per claim and unlimited in total,
— Motor Insurance — minimum indemnity limits: for the loss of life or personal injury unlimited; for damage to property GBP 10 000 000 per claim and unlimited in total.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Bus company bidders must declare that they have passed the financial standing test of the Traffic Commissioner and have a PSV Operator Licence/Special Restricted Licence.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Provide PSV Operator Licence/Special Restricted Licence Number.

REFERENCE_TO_LAW.P: Holders of PSV Operators Licence/Special Restricted Licence.

PLACE.P: Angus House, Sylvie Way, Orchardbank Business Park, Forfar DD8 1AN.

INFO_ADD.P: Note: To register your interest in this notice and obtain any additional information please visit the Public Contracts Scotland website at http://www.publiccontractsscotland.gov.uk/Search/Search_Switch.aspx?ID=476904

The buyer has indicated that it will accept electronic responses to this notice via the Postbox facility. A user guide is available at http://www.publiccontractsscotland.gov.uk/sitehelp/help_guides.aspx
Suppliers are advised to allow adequate time for uploading documents and to dispatch the electronic response well in advance of the closing time to avoid any last minute problems.
The Contracting Authority does not intend to include a subcontract clause in this contract.
